Player History
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1966...
Injured on 9/5/1967 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 7/7/1969 to a minor league deal...
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by Houston in 1971...
Injured on 5/13/1971 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Injured on 7/21/1971 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 5/19/1975...
Won World Series with Houston in 1979...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1980...
Injured on 8/21/1981 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/31/1982 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1982...
Injured on 6/26/1983 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/17/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $1,080,000 per year...
